frameDefinitions: The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
An Entity is judged to be sensually pleasing or intellectually interesting to a (generally implicit) Judge.
A Mother and Father produce a Child or an Egg. 'Betty bore Gerry three intelligent daughters.'
Words in this frame have to do with a Cognizer creating a new intellectual entity, the Idea.
This frame concerns the inception of the life of a Child, generally human, at a particular Time and Place.
A Grower endeavors to tend to and influence the environment of Food so as to foster its growth.
frameExamples: The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
We saw this <t>beautiful</t> boat with the red sails several times
I 've been trying to <t>come up</t> with a plan .
Little Jessie <t>came into the world</t> at 8 last night.
listRoleDefinitions: The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A modifier expressing    the deviation of the implicit value either from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
<fen>Mother</fen> is the female creature that produces the <fen>Child</fen>.
<fen>Child</fen> identifies the new self-motile creature produced from the <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen>.
<fen>Father</fen> is the male creature that copulates with the <fen>Mother</fen>, thus  leading to the birth of the <fen>Child</fen>.
<fen>Egg</fen> is an immobile object containing an organism that may hatch as a mobile, infant organism.
The <fen>Mother</fen> and <fen>Father</fen> expressed together.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.

Cognizer is the person who comes up with or conceptualizes the Invention. It is normally expressed as an External Argument: 

<fex name='Cognizer'>Kim</fex> <t>devised</t> a new recipe.
Invention is the intellectual creation of the Cognizer. It is normally expressed as an NP Object, but sometimes as a PP Complement:
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Idea</fen> is created.
The location in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>Idea</fen>.
<fen>Child</fen> identifies the new self-motile creature.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the birth occurs, generally expressed as a date or a year.
The location where the <fen>Child</fen> enters the world.
The <fen>Grower</fen> is the agent growing <fen>Food</fen>.

<fex name='Food'>Food</fex> is the item grown by the <fen>Grower</fen>, which can include things not traditionally eaten, like flowers, etc., or items for other consumption-related uses, like medicines, smokables, etc.
When the growing event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Female clownfish lay <fex>their eggs</fex> around sea anemones
<fex>We</fex> are going to be having twins!
You had better hatch some plans <fex>before you get there</fex>.
She had cooked up the story <fex>in Pisa</fex>, before she even left Italy.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Fruit of the Tree of Life
